title: Restructure TaskExecutionHost tests so per-test cleanup is saner
body: @dsplaisted made an excellent point in https://github.com/rainersigwald/msbuild/commit/edf54aa7bb168ba1c33883dd55bc43649ba2eb40#commitcomment-13250116.  It's downright weird to call `Dispose()` as part of the preamble of setting up a test.  That's essentially what the MSTest version of the test was doing, so we'll keep it that way for now . . . but the tests should be restructured to be more "xunit-y" and have better cleanup paradigms.
